WorkItem.Description:
Hi guys,

i think, this is just a small feature wish, but would be great to have something similar to a search and replace function.
I would call this Tokenreplacer.

This way we could replace ###date### with a date text or ###name### with the customername without the need of completly dynamicly creating the document.

Regards
Kay

Comments.Message:
should be possible with an iteration over PHPWord::getSections();
Iteration over PHPWord_Section::getElements()

Additionally each text element needs a function "replace($token, $what)"
Now it's possible to check wether such an element has the above method 
http://de.php.net/method_exists

Using that tables may get this function as well an distribute the call to all cells.

What do you think?
Regards
Kay
